mode silencieux m (uncountable)

  1. silent mode (setting available on mobile phones and pagers that, when activated, disables the ringtones and, in some cases, also the vibrating alerts or alarm)
    Synonym: silencieux
    Coordinate terms: mode avion, mode vibreur
    mettre son téléphone en mode silencieux ― to put one's phone in silent mode

title: mode silencieux
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /mɔd si.lɑ̃.sjø/
